topics.body:
The idea of a girlfriend is a nice one, but I want to make sure I know what I'm doing in life before getting serious about a relationship.
I've been hit on by more guys than girls in my life though. It's kinda irritating really.
Then again, I guess many might think I'm gay because I dislike talking about sexual stuff in public. That and I'm kinda camp.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57
